subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry beat Brad Adamonis and Jay Williamson to win the John Deere Classic and Paula Creamer shot a two-over 73 to win the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic.
snippet: Kenny Perry beat Brad Adamonis and Jay Williamson to win the John Deere Classic and Paula Creamer shot a two-over 73 to win the Jamie Farr Owens Corning Classic.
